a.n: Bargain-Loving Brits in the Sun III (7)

p.k: Former Glaswegian taxi drivers Pete and Kath came to Benidorm to retire, but then took on a bar. Michael is on a fishing trip with three mates from Villamar campsite. Fitness instructor Anthony has organised a campsite coach trip to the stunning Algar waterfalls, while James and David have rented a working farm.
